description: News about News Corporation, including commentary and archival articles published in The New York Times.
title: Twenty-First Century Fox Inc.
title_page: Twenty-First Century Fox Inc. - The New York Times
maintext:
Piers Morgan signs a new deal with his first boss, Rupert Murdoch.
The television host's last job came to an end when he stormed off the set. Under the new deal, he will host a show and write a column.
